page.title: 04ECOLOGY
page.content: WASTE GROUND ST.NICHOLAS' TIP St Nicholas tip is an area of waste ground that was once a rubbish tip but is now abandoned and covered in shrubs and wild flowers.The area is bumpy and uneven.There is a fenced off area saying DANGER KEEP OUT CONTAMINATED AREA.The fence is broken down in parts.The area is contaminated with poisens such as methane gas and asbestos.Tanghall Beck runs partly underground in a culvert and it runs partly open .The northern edge used to have a railway line but the rails have been lifted.At the western edge there is a railway frieght depot.
